mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portico at the East Front of The Mansion at Mt. Vernon
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: N. G. Johnson, Photographer, No. 317 Pa. Avenue, Washington, D. C. Only Authorized Publisher of Mt. Vernon Views.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view looking down the length of the piazza with visitors seated on benches and a long figure standing at the far end. Mounted on orange board. The photographer's imprint on the stereograph mount reads, N. G. Johnson, Photographer, No. 317 Pa. Avenue, Washington, D. C. Only Authorized Publisher of Mt. Vernon Views. The reverse of the stereograph has an adhered printed label - Portico at the East Front of The Mansion at Mount Vernon, Showing the stone tiling imported from the Isle of Wight, and so often walked upon by Washington. N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 426 7th St., Washington, D. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
